## Introduction


A collection of data that might be useful for future projects.

[Mouse ATAC Atlas](http://atlas.gs.washington.edu/mouse-atac/data/#atac-matrices): 1 scRNA-Seq and sc-ATAC-Seq data.

[DC3](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-019-12547-1#data-availability): 1 scRNA, ATAC, HiC

[Couple NMF](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6065048/?report=classic): 1 scRNA and ATAC-Seq.

[conquer](http://imlspenticton.uzh.ch:3838/conquer/): scRNA data collection. Around 40 datasets.

[bsseq](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/vignettes/bsseq/inst/doc/bsseq_analysis.html): DNA methylation data for binomial smoothing.
